entries.name: new(args = [], options = {}, config = {})
entries.desc: Add shell to initialize config values.

entries.name: shell()
entries.desc: Holds the shell for the given Bundler::Thor instance. If no shell is given, it gets a default shell from Bundler::Thor::Base.shell.

entries.name: with_padding()
entries.desc: Yields the given block with padding.
